Improvements.Improvement: Split single method into multiple methods
Improvements.Change_Diff: Replace the entire method with multiple methods each handling a specific case.
Improvements.Description: The method is currently doing too many things. It would be more maintainable and readable if you split it into multiple methods, each responsible for a single operation.

Improvements.Change_Diff: Replace all string literals used for comparison with constant variables.
Improvements.Description: The method contains many string literals, which are used to compare and determine what operation should be performed. These can be replaced with constants, which would be more maintainable.

Improvements.Improvement: Replace System.out.println with a logging framework
Improvements.Change_Diff: Replace all calls to System.out.println with equivalent logging calls.
Improvements.Description: Instead of using System.out.println for logging, use a logging framework like log4j or SLF4J. This allows for more flexible output control and better performance.
